publication.abstract: Summary: GoFish is a Java application that allows users to search for gene products with particular gene ontology (GO) attributes, or combinations of attributes. GoFish ranks gene products by the degree to which they satisfy a Boolean query. Four organisms are currently supported: Saccaromyces cerevisiae, Caenorhabditis elegans, Drosophila melanogaster, and M.musculus.
publication.title: GoFish finds genes with combinations of Gene Ontology attributes

summary.description: Select a subset of Gene Ontology (GO) attributes, and ranks genes according to the probability of having all those attributes.
summary.name: GoFish
